name: daos

name: daos
servers: []

name: daos_cust
servers: []
access_points:
- foo1.com:9999
- bar1.com:1111
port: 11111
transport_config:
  client_cert_dir: /tmp/clients
  ca_cert: /tmp/ca.crt
  cert: /tmp/serv.crt
  key: /tmp/serv.key
fault_path: /foo.com
fault_cb: /tmp/daos_fault_cb.sh
fabric_ifaces:
- ib0
- ib1
provider: ofi+verbs
scm_mount_path: /tmp/daos
bdev_include:
- pcie1000.0.0.0.8
- pcie1000.0.0.0.9
bdev_exclude:
- pcie1000.0.0.0.7
hyperthreads: true
socket_dir: /tmp/daos_server
